definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: But voters cannot choose Rafsanjani this time.
sentences.chinese: 但選民們這次不能選擇拉夫桑賈尼。

sentences.english: Rafsanjani extended a warm welcome to Jiang.
sentences.chinese: 拉夫桑賈尼對江主席訪伊表示熱烈歡迎。
